actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require the label on certain food products to disclose the total sugar content thereof.

summary.text: Sugar Disclosure Labeling Act - Requires, under the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act, that if the amount of sugar present in a package provides ten percent or more of the total calories in the food, the label must bear a declaration of the portion of the weight of food which is sugar.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require the label on certain food products to disclose the total sugar content thereof.
